ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Subject: Re: UPDATE 2 - we're getting there!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is by *far* the best idea I ve seen for a new song. Group-centric, very original, and doesn t tread on any other class specialties. -- John H. Kim
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Mar 2000 John_Senior@... wrote:
>
> Denon's Distructive War Cry
> Level: 49+
> Skill: Singing
> Description: This song is a true battle song, the bard gives the war cry
> and all group members (melee only) become so enraged that they fight at
> double the normal speed (doesn't stack with other haste items) and deal
> double normal damage. This lasts for 3 ticks only and is then unusable for
> 5/10 minutes (bard needs time to recover), a bit like Divine Aura. This
> song once sung does not stack with other songs.

This is by *far* the best idea I've seen for a new song.
Group-centric, very original, and doesn't tread on any other
class' specialties.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
